comparison.description: Determines how the amount of referenced entities in the specified power should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the amount of referenced entities in the specified power should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the amount of referenced entities in the specified power will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the amount of referenced entities in the specified power will be compared to.

type.description:
## Set Size

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/set_size)

Compares the amount of entities stored in a power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/set_size) to a certain value.

Type ID: `origins:set_size`

---

###	Examples

```json
"condition": {
	"type": "origins:set_size",
	"set": "example:special_pets",
	"comparison": ">",
	"compare_to": 0
}
```

This example will check if the amount of entities stored in the `example:special_pets` (`data/example/powers/special_pets.json`) power is non-zero (e.g: if it's not empty).

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Set Size (Entity Condition Type) date: 2023-12-14

Set Size

Entity Condition Type

Compares the amount of entities stored in a power that uses the Entity Set (Power Type) to a certain value.

Type ID: origins:set_size

Fields

Field Type Default Description
set Identifier The ID of the power.
comparison Comparison Determines how the amount of referenced entities in the specified power should be compared to the specified value.
compare_to Integer The value at which the amount of referenced entities in the specified power will be compared to.

Examples

"condition": {
	"type": "origins:set_size",
	"set": "example:special_pets",
	"comparison": ">",
	"compare_to": 0
}

This example will check if the amount of entities stored in the example:special_pets (data/example/powers/special_pets.json) power is non-zero (e.g: if it's not empty).
